Click
=====

Simulate mouse events.

Example
-------

```js
var click = require('click');

var a = document.createElement('a');
a.setAttribute('href', '/2013');
document.body.appendChild(a);

// Simulate right click:
click(a, {button: 2});

// Simulate ctrl click:
click(a, {ctrlKey: true});
```
